review:
I'm glad that i consulted Dr.Kavitha on time. I had a gum bleeding issue and i consulted her. She did the deep cleaning pretty well and the whole process was smooth. I was so satisfied with her work. She is very professional and friendly. Importantly, she made me understand the cause and precautionary measures to be taken later. 

I greatly recommend her to everyone.

Excellent and Professional service. Had been there for my wisdom tooth removal. Doctor was kind enough to explain the details of the procedure. Made me comfortable and feel good all the time I was on the chair.

Had visited Partha Dental at SahakarNagar ,was very happy after meeting Dr Kavitha her patience and care towards patients is ultimate was very much pleased to get treated from her thank you Partha.I insist my friends and family here.

Excellent service and treatment by Dr. Kavitha and staff are very kind and helpful. She solves all the queries. The treatment went so well with no rush. I am happy that I trusted the clinic and i trusted Dr. Kavitha for the treatment. Thank you!

Had been to partha dental clinic sahakaranagar, for my hairloss
Dr kavitha explained  causes &  treatment procedure .
Started PRP , later to GFC-- my hairloss is controlled.
Hair Quality has improved drastically.
Thank you so much partha dental
